title: strongest tft team possible
body: Darius, Draven, Swain, Gnar, Asol, Shyvana, yasuo (7 units) imperial, shapeshifters, dragons, exile, blade masters. If you get to 10 units, throw in kindred, karthus (or morde), katarina [gain double damage for all imperials and phantom bonus]. Stack defence units on shyvana/gnar/darius and damage on any you want to carry, most likely draven. Of course this team comp is snear impossible to complete but if you do its insane.
